name: sportline
description: NCAAM betting CLI with parlay EV ranking

scripts.train: node dist/index.js model train --sport ncaam --season 2024,2025 --markets moneyline && node dist/index.js model train --sport cfb --season 2024,2025 --markets moneyline && node dist/index.js model train --sport nfl --season 2024,2025 --markets moneyline && node dist/index.js model train --sport nfl --season 2023,2024,2025 --markets total && node dist/index.js model train --sport nba --season 2024,2025 --markets moneyline,spread && node dist/index.js model train --sport nba --season 2023,2024,2025 --markets total && node dist/index.js model train --sport nhl --season 2024,2025 --markets moneyline
scripts.backtest: node dist/index.js model backtest --sport ncaam --season 2024,2025 --market moneyline && node dist/index.js model backtest --sport cfb --season 2024,2025 --market moneyline && node dist/index.js model backtest --sport nfl --season 2024,2025 --market moneyline && node dist/index.js model backtest --sport nfl --season 2023,2024,2025 --market total && node dist/index.js model backtest --sport nba --season 2024,2025 --market moneyline && node dist/index.js model backtest --sport nba --season 2024,2025 --market spread && node dist/index.js model backtest --sport nba --season 2023,2024,2025 --market total && node dist/index.js model backtest --sport nhl --season 2024,2025 --market moneyline
scripts.update: npm run ingest && npm run train
